name: Christmas Carts
description:
Holiday-themed puzzle game. This game was created in 3 days for the Cozy Winter Jam 2022.

Help Santa move presents to his bag. Connect the tracks to create a path from the present to the bag. The path must also be a minimum number of tracks long.

Controls:

  • Left click: Rotate track clockwise
  • Right Click: Rotate track counter-clockwise
  • R: Create new level
  • S: Auto-solve level (if you're stuck)

Credits:

  • Dustin : Programming / Design
  • Austin : Art / Design
  • Music / SFX: https://www.freesound.org
  • Fonts: https://www.1001freefonts.com
